name: Baby
greetingText: It's been 7 months of you being my favorite person on earth. Can you imagine?
wishText: May this day be your best one yet! ;)
text1: I know I did you wrong and I want to sincerely apologize and promise that I will make it upto you.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you my love!!
text2: It's another year round the sun and I want you to know I gatchu.
text3: May the Lord shower you with more life and blessings.
text4: The past year has been full of wins for you babygirl
text4Adjective: I hope this new chapter of life will be even better
text5Content: Something special for my special someone
outroText: I love you so much babygirl.
